system.description: When your Movement would take you into an obstacle that could reasonably be traversed within your Overland Movement Allowance, you may make a Hard (-20) Acrobatics check to temporarily grant yourself [Wallclimber] during that movement. If you have not returned to stable ground before your activation ends, you immediately fall.

actions.name: Parkour
actions.description: When your Movement would take you into an obstacle that could reasonably be traversed within your Overland Movement Allowance, you may make a Hard (-20) Acrobatics check to temporarily grant yourself [Wallclimber] during that movement. If you have not returned to stable ground before your activation ends, you immediately fall.
